NM_000255.4:c.445_446insA.reason: Insertion at c.445_446 of A should shift 3' to c.446_447 since c.446=A matches inserted base, becoming c.446dup. Mutalyzer incorrectly reports c.445dup but c.445=G which doesn't match inserted A.

NR_027676.2:n.5453A>C.reason: NR_ transcripts are non-coding and must use n. coordinates, not c. coordinates. Mutalyzer incorrectly converts n. to c.
NR_027676.2:n.5453A>C.spec_reference: HGVS: Coordinate systems for non-coding transcripts

NR_027676.2:n.622G>A.reason: NR_ transcripts are non-coding and must use n. coordinates. Mutalyzer bug: converts n. to c.
NR_027676.2:n.622G>A.spec_reference: HGVS: Coordinate systems for non-coding transcripts

NR_027676.2:n.3993C>T.reason: NR_ transcripts are non-coding and must use n. coordinates. Mutalyzer bug: converts n. to c.
NR_027676.2:n.3993C>T.spec_reference: HGVS: Coordinate systems for non-coding transcripts

NR_027676.2:n.322C>A.reason: NR_ transcripts are non-coding and must use n. coordinates. Mutalyzer bug: converts n. to c.
NR_027676.2:n.322C>A.spec_reference: HGVS: Coordinate systems for non-coding transcripts

NR_027676.2:n.4999dup.reason: NR_ transcripts are non-coding and must use n. coordinates. Mutalyzer bug: converts n. to c.
NR_027676.2:n.4999dup.spec_reference: HGVS: Coordinate systems for non-coding transcripts

NM_001407634.1:c.4110_4111GT[1].reason: Reference has 2 copies of GT at c.4110-4113. Specifying GT[1] means deletion of one copy. Ferro correctly converts to c.4112_4113del (3' normalized). Mutalyzer incorrectly thinks reference has only 1 copy.
NM_001407634.1:c.4110_4111GT[1].spec_reference: HGVS: Repeat notation for tandem repeats

NM_001167619.3:c.-798del.reason: 5'UTR deletion at c.-798 should shift 3' to c.-797 because both positions have G. In 5'UTR, 3' direction is toward the CDS (less negative numbers). Mutalyzer fails to apply 3' shift.
NM_001167619.3:c.-798del.spec_reference: HGVS 3.1: 3' rule applies in 5'UTR toward CDS

LRG_321t6:c.478_479dup.reason: Both representations are valid HGVS. Mutalyzer converts to repeat notation while ferro keeps as duplication. Either is acceptable.
LRG_321t6:c.478_479dup.spec_reference: HGVS: Repeat notation is optional for duplications

NM_001408427.1:c.761_762insGG.reason: Both representations are valid HGVS. Ferro converts to repeat notation (G homopolymer expansion to 5 copies), mutalyzer keeps as insertion. Either is acceptable.
